content: when it comes to holiday season decoration its always fun and exciting to add you own handmade projects adding your own handmade crochet projects definitely adds a personal touch to the decorations handmade crochet projects also make wonderful gifts for your family and loved ones today am sharing the pattern for a simple crochet christmas placemat the colors used definitely speak christmas you can also crochet them year along with any choice of your yarn color to suit any occasion this christmas placemat will be a beautiful addition to your holiday table materials used - 4 ply cotton knitting yarn 4 mm crochet hook size - 8 inches- customizable to any size checkout the video tutorial here https //youtu be/q8-o6pltpci
